transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello. Haan ji.
Customer: Rahul ji Ruksar baat kar rahi hu IndiaMART se.
Customer: Boliye.
Executive: Sir ye services ko leke maine aapko call kiya tha apni services chal rahi hai na IndiaMART pe?
Customer: Haan haan.
Executive: Haan usi ke feedback se related main aap se discussion kar rahi thi. Ye hamare paas ek concern bhi aaya hua tha aur aapki Vikram se is bare mein baat bhi hui hai.
Customer: Haan haan boliye.
Executive: Haan. Aap bataiye kya problem face kar rahe hain sir abhi aap?
Customer: Mam, main yehi nahi hai mera kaam ki main har ek ko yehi batata firu ki meri kya problem hai na. Main pichle char saal se juda hua hu business nahi aa raha hai isliye mera concern hai aur kuch nahi hai, theek hai?
Executive: Pichle char saal se aapko business nahi aa raha hai sir?
Customer: Haan dekhiye mam aap dekhiye portal pe dekhiye. Koi call nahi hai, koi baat nahi hai mera jo main product hai uske liye koi koi bhi tarah ka call nahi hai. Main pichle.
Executive: Theek hai.
Customer: Theek hai mam agar business hota ho to de dijiye nahi hai to aisa koi iron cast nahi hai na.
Executive: Aapko Vikram ne kuch leads abhi bheji hai WhatsApp pe.
Customer: Mam wo lead meri nahi hai ab Goa, Assam, Kerala waha pe ye koi 10-15 hazaar, 20 hazaar, 2 lakh, 70 hazaar ka item koi hamare yaha se thodi leta hum Rajasthan mein baithe hain, Jodhpur mein. Wo Kerala ki lead hamare ko de rahe ho aur wo item jo matlab koi jyada value ka bhi nahi hai. Ye koi matlab kya sense hai is baat ka? Main baar baar kya bolu mam main ye kaam nahi hai ki hamara hum aapko bhi samjhaye pehle rupya de fir aapko samjhaye. Aisa thodi kar paunga aap to hamesha alag alag ho jate hain IndiaMART ki team badi hai hum to same hain. Roz naya aadmi phone karta hai.
Executive: Nahi aapke account manager aapko call karte hain na Vikram.
Customer: Nahi nahi mam wo theek hai account manager Vikram ji abhi pichle teen mahine se call kar rahe hain usse pehle koi aur kar raha tha. Ab aapka phone abhi aa raha hai isse pehle koi aur mam ka phone aa raha tha. Hum yehi thodi hai mam ki har ek ko yehi samjhate fire ki hamara kya concern hai hame kya takleef hai. Ya to fir ye kar do ki bhai main aapko hi batata firu. Jab tak lead nahi aayegi to koi satisfy nahi hoga mam ye baat hai aur kuch nahi.
Hamara koi local business ho to hamara Rajasthan Rajasthan mein koi lead aaye hamara main product hai wo hai affluent treatment plant. Plant ka abhi tak koi lead aaya nahi hai aap check kar lijiye. Main pichle char panch saal se aapko paise pay kar raha hu.
Executive: SSRO plant.
Customer: Haan. Nahi SSRO plant nahi affluent treatment plant. Hota ho to de dijiye mam aisa koi aapke upar koi jor jabardasti hai nahi hai na. Main main ho gaya hu pareshan ab IndiaMART se. Buyer se jyada aapke call aate hain. Theek hai na?
Executive: Theek hai. Sir dekhiye hum to aapko service feedback ke liye.
Customer: Nahi nahi mam are wo theek hai mam aapki baat samajh gaya main yehi keh raha hu ki aap logo ko kuch nahi lagta aapka ye job hai par mera ye job nahi hai ki main aapko jawab du.
Executive: Haan ji. Bhiya aap correct keh rahe hain ki lekin agar sir kuch beech mein kuch gap rahega aapki lead se related.
Customer: Gap mam ye har koi yehi bolta hai main Vikram ji se 50 baar baat kar chuka hu. Ab fir bhi gap hai to wo fulfill main to nahi kar paunga na mam. Agar fir bhi koi gap hai to uska mere paas koi jawab nahi hai. Agar aapke paas leads hai to dijiye koi main aapko koi dabav nahi dal raha hu. Maine pay kiya hai ab aapki duty banti hai agar hota ho to dijiye nahi hota to main koi koi koi wo foundation nahi hai mam aapko otherwise mat lijiye na.
Executive: Nahi aapki baat main samajh gayi hu leads to hum aapko denge definitely abhi sirf jo hamare paas abhi jo mujhe filter lagana hai location ka wo sirf Rajasthan ya nearby Rajasthan bhi karenge sir aap.
Customer: Rajasthan ke liye koi bhi hamare ko Kerala se order nahi dega aap samjhe common common baat hai aisa koi hum koi wo nahi hai ki monopoly wala kaam hai ki ye hum hi banate hain ya fir hamse hi lenge aisa nahi hota hai. Thoda aap categorize karo jaise koi bada plant hai jaise affluent treatment plant hai na uske liye log out of state bhi jate hain. Bilkul. Ab chota product hai uske liye aap hamare ko lead de rahe hain ye kuch sense nahi banta mam us cheez ka. Bada product hai affluent treatment plant ho gaya STP ho gaya ye bade product hai ya out of Rajasthan bhi lead aayegi to hame jana bhi padega apne representative dalna bhi padega client ko milke bhi aa jayenge koi takleef nahi hai. Ab 30-40 hazaar ke liye hum thodi Kerala jayenge mam. Haan na wo cheez hai aap ek baar jo bhi hai aapka jo bhi filter system hai wo aap dekhiye mam hum to aapko kya hi bole aisa baar baar.
Executive: Nahi sir baar baar ki baat nahi hai lekin main abhi to aapko sirf isliye baat kar rahi thi piche hamare paas concern open tha to maine socha ki main bhi ek baar aap se baat kar lu.
Customer: Nahi nahi mam aap apni jagah bilkul sahi hai main aapko nahi blame kar raha hu. Aap samajh rahe hain mam? Main aapko blame nahi kar raha hu main to baat kar raha hu main meri baat rakh raha hu hamesha.
Executive: Dekhiye jitna mujhe aap se baat karke samajh mein aaya wo ye hai ki agar badi chhote amount ki deals hai customers hai to wo sirf aap Rajasthan karenge theek hai aur agar badi deal aati hai jaise for example SSRO plant ki koi aapke paas mein koi customer hamare paas aaye hain to wo matter nahi karta wo location kaun si hai aap us customer se baat kar sakte hain jitna mujhe samajh mein aaya wo yehi hai abhi isme agar main correct kaha?
Customer: Mam SSRO plant nahi hai ye affluent treatment plant hai.
Executive: Nahi hamare paas SSRO plant bhi add hai aapke catalog mein. Ye add hai?
Customer: SSRO plant theek hai mam par affluent treatment plant STP sewage treatment plant ye sab maine add karwaye hain na Vikram ji se?
Executive: Haan.
Customer: Wo cheezon ki lead chahiye mam hamare ko.
Executive: Treatment plant. Accha you have filtration system hai industrial ultra filtration system hai do filtration hai.
Executive: Theek hai main Vikram se kehti hu ki jo acchi leads hai in sare products mein no matter kahan ki hai aapko wo WhatsApp kar de theek hai. Again main aapko bata rahi hu ki agar koi problem aapko aati hai kisi bhi tarike se aap Vikram aur mere sath dono ke sath coordinate kar sakte hain theek hai. Main lead ka ek baar.
Customer: Problem problem kya aati hai mam main samjha nahi aap problem ki baat kar rahe hain problem to kya hai lead nahi aayegi wo problem hai. Yes sir bilkul.
Customer: Haan lead aap de do koi problem nahi hai.
Customer: Problem kya hai mam ab main pichle panch saal se sun raha hu problem aaye to hamare ko call karo problem to kya aayegi mam koi buyer hamare ko koi.
Executive: Sir dekhiye hum log acknowledge karne ki koshish karte hain aapka chhote se chhota concern agar aap sirf not about by leads agar aap iske alava bhi kuch aur kuch face kar rahe hain hum usko bhi acknowledge karenge aur resolve karne ki koshish karenge hamara kaam sirf aapko problem ka agar kuch bhi hai kuch bhi x x y theek hai mam by list de dijiye to hum kar lenge fir baki to hum agar sahi hamare ko client milega na to fir hum aapko thank you bolenge.
Executive: Theek hai otherwise koi sense hi nahi banta matlab IndiaMART aur kya karega hamara bataiye aap. Bilkul correct. Aap yahi kar sakte hain by list denge aur to kya karenge aap bataiye. Haan. Hai na aap hamara portal hai aap thoda accha video bana ke do accha portal bana ke do to wo cheeze samajh mein aati hai wo ka wo pada hai pichle char saal se main bhi dekh raha hu. Fir main baar baar wo cheez aapko bolu to accha business nahi lagta na mam aisa. Haan. Hai na wo cheeze to aapko samajhni chahiye ki kya humne kya kiya client ne to 70 hazaar rupay hamare ko de diye humne client ko kya diya. Wo aap dekhiye na ab hum to wo thodi dekhenge ki aap ye kariye naya catalog banao naya photo lagao naya video banao kuch banao promotion karo hamara online to to wo sense banta hai otherwise to facebook meta add wala to bahut badhiya kaam kar raha hai. Theek hai na aur usse lead bhi aa rahi hai. Ye wo kaam kariye mam to hamare ko bhi accha lagta hai otherwise to kaam to chal hi raha hai kaam khub aa raha hai offline bhi accha kaam aa raha hai. Hmm. To aapki baat kar rahe hain. Theek hai. Ji main sir ye Vikram ko send kar deti hu ek baar ki wo aapko thodi better leads bhej de WhatsApp pe theek hai. Again ye jo concern open hai agar aap kahe to main isko close kar deti hu kyuki hum further aage jo bhi kaam kar rahe hain wo hum aapko uska update dete rahenge. Wo concern mam concern off kar lo pehle bhi bahut ki hai abhi bhi kar lo par concern rahega na concern yu kahi rahega na. Nahi nahi don't worry sir wo nahi rahega wahi maine aapse kaha na ki agar koi problem hoti hai kyuki concern hum log believe karte hain ki wo problem hai agar aapko kuch bhi problem ho rahi hai hum usko acknowledge karne ke liye account manager se aapko coordinate karte hain sab aapke hath mein hi hai band karna off karna on karna aap kar lijiye. Theek hai main isko close kar deti hu kuch rahega to sir contact kar lijiyega baki main Vikram ko discussion jo bhi mera aapse hua hai main bata deti hu theek hai. Okay thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is not getting business since 4 years.

- Dissatisfied with the quality of buyleads.

- Frustrated with frequent changes in account managers.

- Wants leads specific to Rajasthan only.

- Dissatisfied with the IndiaMART portal.



Resolution:

- Executive assured to provide better quality buyleads.

- Executive will share customer feedback with Vikram.

- Executive offered coordination with her and Vikram.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will send customer's feedback to Vikram.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, account manager, portal
